ShadowSiren:AttackTextContainer.NAME: Generic Attack Text
ShadowSiren:AttackTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when playing an attack.

ShadowSiren:SkillTextContainer.NAME: Generic Skill Text
ShadowSiren:SkillTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when playing a skill.

ShadowSiren:PowerTextContainer.NAME: Generic Power Text
ShadowSiren:PowerTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when playing a power.

ShadowSiren:BattleStartTextContainer.NAME: Battle Start Text
ShadowSiren:BattleStartTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the beginning of combat.

ShadowSiren:LowHPBattleStartTextContaine.NAME: Low HP Battle Start Text
ShadowSiren:LowHPBattleStartTextContaine.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the beginning of combat if you are badly injured.

ShadowSiren:BattleEndTextContainer.NAME: Battle End Text
ShadowSiren:BattleEndTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the end of combat.

ShadowSiren:BossFightTextContainer.NAME: Boss Fight Text
ShadowSiren:BossFightTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the beginning of a boss fight.

ShadowSiren:HealingTextContainer.NAME: Healing Text
ShadowSiren:HealingTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when healing.

ShadowSiren:FieldDamageTextContainer.NAME: Field Damage Text
ShadowSiren:FieldDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when taking thorns damage.

ShadowSiren:LightDamageTextContainer.NAME: Light Damage Text
ShadowSiren:LightDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when taking light damage.

ShadowSiren:HeavyDamageTextContainer.NAME: Heavy Damage Text
ShadowSiren:HeavyDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when taking heavy damage.

ShadowSiren:BlockedDamageTextContainer.NAME: Blocked Damage Text
ShadowSiren:BlockedDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when blocking damage.

ShadowSiren:HomemarkTextContainer.NAME: Homemark Text
ShadowSiren:HomemarkTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when spending gold with the Homemark.

ShadowSiren:KOTextContainer.NAME: KO Text
ShadowSiren:KOTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when defeated in battle.
